subject: p11474065
Impression: PA and lateral chest, : Previous right pleural thickening is improving, following tracheobronchoplasty via right thoracotomy. Posterior rib osteotomy, unchanged in relative position. Normal postoperative cardiomediastinal silhouette, including borderline cardiomegaly predating surgery. Lungs grossly clear. Lateral view shows prior cementoplasty, vertebral bodies thoracolumbar spine.
